B086X7QKHD.title: Great!
B086X7QKHD.review: Great

B086X7QKHD.title: Awesome product!!!
B086X7QKHD.review: This is a piece of very handy equipment for Photographers and Civil Engineers!!!

B086X7QKHD.title: Great drone
B086X7QKHD.review: Great drone overall.Had an issue with one of the three batteries where it would not charge.Contacted the seller and was sent a return label immediately. Just received the battery and all is good.

B086X7QKHD.title: Amazing drone!
B086X7QKHD.review: First off,the package arrived exactly when it said it would.I opened the box and was blown away by just how much fit in that tiny bit protective little bag.I bought this used because the shipper had listed it at quite a discount.My hat is off to the seller,the drone and all batteries looked basically brand new! The charger even still had the plastic on it! DJI truly is amazing! It was a bit difficult to get set up,but after that WOW! I have 7 other drones but this is my first DJI. I now know why they are called the best.Note to anyone interested in getting a DJI. You have to go to their website to get the app for both your phone as well as a pc or laptop.That way you can upgrade the firmware.Once you do that,you are golden.The camera is crystal clear and takes clean photos.The drone hands out even in stiff winds.The obstacle avoidance is wonderful,I actually tried to run this thing into a small bush just to test it,nope it wouldn't let me.So it's nothing but DJI for me from now on.

B086X7QKHD.title: Refurbished, you get what you pay for
B086X7QKHD.review: The drone was mostly fine on arrival, within a week however one of the axis on the gimbal started to loosen. This was without any crashes or mal treatment. When it started to loosen the gimbal kept over compensating in order to balance itself, which basically means it vibrated a lot making the video unusable. The seller worked with me and I returned it, I am satisfied with customer service. Just be smart about refurbished stuff.

B086X7QKHD.title: Drone promised obstacle avoidance, it doesn’t work!
B086X7QKHD.review: The drone lost elevation on its first flight and got stuck in the top of a tree. That means the obstacle avoidance system stinks and the drones ability to hold its position is also a joke

B086X7QKHD.title: Best drone made
B086X7QKHD.review: This drone is literally the best drone I've ever flown extremely easy took me 5 mins to get used to it amazing quality extremely durable worth the price

B086X7QKHD.title: App removed from play store.
B086X7QKHD.review: Drone is now useless.

B086X7QKHD.title: This appears to be New old stock…
B086X7QKHD.review: A bit overpriced!This is a brand new product as it seems. But looking at the firmware versions of the controller and the drone, it is apparent that has been sitting around or a buy out. There are no signs of previous used/damage to drone or batteries, also any of the extras included in the combo. Also , no signs that it is a refurbished unit ; controller or drone. I also purchased 2 new batteries from them, in a separate purchase/order. They also appear to be NOS, but genuine DJI.

B086X7QKHD.title: Don't waste your money
B086X7QKHD.review: Firstly if we're being honest, i knew this wasn't a beginner drone, so rating it 1 star for beginners is true. there's a learning curve if you've never flown a drone, i knew that going in. but what i didnt know is that after a year, (literally 13-14 months) the drone would just STOP connecting to the controller/phoneJUST outside of the warranty period of course. so now im stuck with a drone i paid $1000 for that cant do ANYTHING. its a useful paperweight maybe.sure you can send it to DJI and they can maybe fix it, but then you have to pay them more money. what a scam

B086X7QKHD.title: "Mint" Used Drone; Defective on Arrival
B086X7QKHD.review: The drone was listed a "used - Mint", supposedly inspected and in excellent condition.It looked great, like brand new.But one of the three batteries was missing.On startup, the camera gimbal did not work; no movement, and the screen message said "gimbal stuck".It wasn't stuck, just wouldn't move automatically.Amazon's inspection was lacking; how could they not notice a missing battery?Understandably, the gimbal issue was missed entirely because they did not try to fly it.DJI said they could fix it for a price.I returned it to Amazon.

B08C4KWM9T.title: WHERE’S THE BASS?
B08C4KWM9T.review: I received these MOMENTUM3s yesterday, plugged in the case and put them on. What a disappointment!Very little bass compared to the two pairs of Sony XM4s I returned. Even with the bass-boost turned on, I could see little improvement. The battery life seems to be about 5 hours with ANC turned on. Multi-device connectivity works as advertised with no connection problems. The ANC is similar to that of the Sonys, and the fit is OK with of swapping of wings and ear tips. Overall, if you’re buying buying for sound quality, you might well skip these.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Delivers what you expect from Bose
B08C4KWM9T.review: I happen to be a fan of solid bass in all my listening and was replacing a set of NC ear buds which delivered that for me but the batteries had given out.The overall sound delivered by these is superb and the dynamic equalizer from the app allows you to fine tune as you like.These buds deliver full sound from the lows to the highs and I’ve been quite impressed.Also, after making sure you use the correct earpiece, there are small, medium and large supplied, the NC capability for an ear bud is really impressive, way better than my last set.So far I am a huge fan of these even though they are a bit larger than others on the market.Once you get the right fit in your ear you will also find that they stay put as well.Great for working out.

They are pretty good for the most part. However the left side has a constant static/wind noise. Makes the left one almost useless.The right one works just fine.My wife used these and she thought it was just her.For 8 months she used them like that and last month I used hers instead of mine and it about blew my mind.It's aweful!!If I had have known how bad these were I would have returned them right away...

B08C4KWM9T.title: Consistent problems connecting via Bluetooth
B08C4KWM9T.review: I have had these phones for a few months and the one thing I noticed with them is that there is consistent problems connecting to my phone via Bluetooth. I would say they connect to my phone and work properly on the first attempt about 20% of the times I use them. Unacceptable!I open the case, wait for the blue lights to flash, then insert them into the ears. I hear the "Battery 100%, connected to iPhone", but then that's it. Once I attempt to play music, nothing. It doesn't matter the music app (Spotify, Apple Music, Pandora, etc.), the app shows the music playing, but I don't hear anything. Volume is up and everything. The workaround is to put them back into the case, close the case, wait about 10 seconds, open up the case again, wait for the blue lights, insert them into ears. Usually the 2nd time works, but seriously, for the amount of money for these things, they should work PERFECTLY EVERY TIME!! Bose are supposed to be some the best audio products out there, but these buds are a complete letdown.None of the other features mean a thing (battery life, sound cancelling, etc.) if the buds don't ACTUALLY PLAY MUSIC! I have had no problems with battery life or sound cancelling when they do work. They sound great and are very comfortable in the ears. I don't really understand the point of the Bose app as it doesn't really offer anything worth opening a separate app for.When they work, they're great. But the Bluetooth connectivity issue is a huge disappointment from a company I thought was the best in the biz. I would recommend looking at other similar buds and would steer clear of these.

B08C4KWM9T.title: The right buds blew
B08C4KWM9T.review: The dominant earphone is the right and blew

B08C4KWM9T.title: Gift
B08C4KWM9T.review: Gave as a gift to sister and she loves them. She uses them every day.

Bose won't do anything because it's out of warranty. Considering how much I babied these earbuds I can't recommend them if they last for such a short period of time. I used them a couple times a week in an air conditioned room. I never dropped them. Disappointing.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Fine but can be better

And the headphones are old, and the charger is full of fingerprints inside. And I found ear wax and dandruff on the headphones.I would need it for my work tomorrow, but I've now started returning it.

B08C4KWM9T.review: Bose knows how to make speakers, headphones, and earbuds. Bose does not know how to develop software. Unfortunately, Bose requires its customers to use their crappy software to manage their devices, so, at some point, you will have a $200 pair of earbuds you can no longer use.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Fail after one year
B08C4KWM9T.review: As always the ANC is excellent- that's where Bose excels. Sound is good, but no better thanless expensive alternatives( e.g., EarFun) . But the mfg. quality is not there, right earbud failed after a little more than a year (warranty expired, naturally)I've got earbuds over 5 years old that are still working great - cost less than $30. Dropped on floor, stepped on, etc. Still work fine.The Bose buds were treated like the expensive units they are, never used at gym or jogging. And they still crapped out. Think I'll stick with AirPods from now on

B08C4KWM9T.title: Best earbuds ever!
B08C4KWM9T.review: I have small ears and have never been able to find earbuds that don’t make my ears hurt. These are awesome all the way around. They don’t hurt your ears, they cancel out noise and the battery last forever before you have to charge them. Highly recommended!

B08C4KWM9T.title: Wife loves them
B08C4KWM9T.review: Wife likes them way better over the AirPods. The Bose don’t hurt the inside of her ear. Very comfortable

B08C4KWM9T.title: Heavy Static in left ear bud

I babied these earbuds (because they’re $250) and now they blink red and white and wont do anything else.customers support online and via call center are of no help. Warranty expired already. I dont think bose had confidence to warranty this product for even 2 years. Also the microphone is choppy during phone calls. I really loved the sound quality of these ear buds with music but they broke from just regular use. B08C4KWM9T.title: Outstanding noise cancellation. Better than Apple Airpods Pro for Windows 10, Teams and Zoom
B08C4KWM9T.review: I own the Apple Airpods Pro 1 First Generation and they are amazing but not for calls in Windows 10. The sound and microphone quality are both very poor in Microsoft Teams and Zoom. There are a few explanations on the web behind this, but it cannot be fixed. I heard my colleagues with some considerable static and my voice sounded to them sort of robotic and with some static, not too a large extent but still not what you would expect from a $200 piece of hardware.Anyhow I tried these earpods and they are amazing! I highly recommend these for Windows 10, Teams and Zoom. The ANC is much stronger than Apple Airpods Pro's, even outside of Windows 10.If you're deciding between Apple Airpods Pro and Bose QC, think no further. Bose QC are the true winners.

Bose offered to replace the product for me but I don't even want a different pair of this product. I'm now out $200 and I'm just going to get something different.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Not worth it
B08C4KWM9T.review: Do yourself a favor and do not purchase these. Unless you plan to treat them like eggs, they are not worth the money. My case fell off my kitchen counter and instantly broke. Bose does not have replacement cases apparently and from what I've read, the case they come with is specific to only those earbuds, so replacement wouldn't do much. I've never dropped them any other time, but all it took was one time for them to be worthless. Better off going with something that has more durability that can last you longer for your buck.

B08C4KWM9T.title: They'll Drive You Nuts
B08C4KWM9T.review: I've bought a lot of Bose headphones and these feel designed to be as frustrating as possible. They never connect to the Bluetooth source you want and never turn off when you want them to, so you never have battery. Think I might throw them in the river.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Blown Out Low End....waste of money
B08C4KWM9T.review: 5 months into owning these and the low-end/bass blew out in the right earbud. Just muffled rattling...very unpleasant. The warranty says 1 year, but when I went to the website, they just offered me their new quiet comfort 2 earbuds for a discounted rate of $200 (retail $300). Never again.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Great product
B08C4KWM9T.review: Great product

B08C4KWM9T.title: Awesome sound
B08C4KWM9T.review: Love it… good sound and quality

B08C4KWM9T.title: Left hand ear bud malfunctioned within a few months of minimal use.
B08C4KWM9T.review: Item was used very little and within a few months of purchase the left ear bud failed with flashing white red led indicator.Tried online Bose support plus downloads with no success.Item is now unusable.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Good product, but stopped working a year after purchased
B08C4KWM9T.review: Bought it in December 2021, and they were great until last week when all of a sudden red and white lights started flashing. According to them it’s due to a “internal failure” and because it’s out of guarantee, I have to buy a new pair (won’t happen).

B08C4KWM9T.title: A year of light use later, white noise and faulty charge port
B08C4KWM9T.review: I bought these with great anticipation, very pleased with sound quality and noise cancelation. Then the ear buds would randomly pop out, from snug and secure to out of my ear in an instant. But I'm sure that's just my physiology, I've had trouble with this style in the past and have learned to buy ear buds and other Bluetooth devices that loop over the ear. I hoped Bose might have a secret design that might work for me, but no.So in the last year, I've used them maybe 50 times around the house to not interrupt others with the media I consume.About a month ago, the left earbud developed a constant white noise, regardless of whether I had any audio playing or not. Maybe I would have noticed it sooner, but the noise canceling is VERY good and I still like to hear my surroundings and (this was a large disappointment) the left ear cannot be utilized independently from the right. Meaning, I can't use the left without the right, but the right can be used without the left, so with the aforementioned superior noise canceling and my desire to be cognizant of my surroundings, the left rarely got used.Then, the charging port stopped working. I'm not sure why, the case doesn't see much abuse because I don't use the product outside of my house since I can't trust them to stay in my ear. (Again, I'm sure that's more of an issue with my ears than a product design problem).

B08C4KWM9T.title: Not new - can’t pair
B08C4KWM9T.review: The earbuds I received are not new. Bags are broken and I can’t pair them to my iPhoneWhen I put them on it was trying to pair to Amy’s iPhone ???

B08C4KWM9T.title: Gets worn out in 6 months
B08C4KWM9T.review: I’ve had them since July and paid $200 and they are weak now. No longer cancelling as well and sounds just terrible tbh. Very upset.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Lasted one year
B08C4KWM9T.review: I love Bose but no longer.These ear buds lasted one year and I MAYBE used them once a month! Obviously they are not making quality products anymore. If you want a long lasting product, look elsewhere!

B08C4KWM9T.title: Doesn't day on ears
B08C4KWM9T.review: It's a shame, when these work they work. The noise canceling is amazing and the sound quality is great!Now if only they actually stayed on yout ears. That's right. They fall of for any little movement. To think these are sold as sport headphones. Nope they fall off before ypu even start moving sometimes. Best part, Adjusting them back into your ear pauses the music.Try harder Bose. (And yes I've tried every rubber ear piece available)If only I could get a refund.

B08C4KWM9T.title: Not worth 200
B08C4KWM9T.review: You are unable to use just 1 ear bud you must wear both. Music sounds great but call quality is unleveled. Spikes high and low and crackles quite a bit

B08C4KWM9T.title: Great for music and movies --- not so great for phone calls
B08C4KWM9T.review: The bad.... While on a call, numerous people have commented about the low quality of the sound, saying it is distant, noisy, and tinny (all high end). Even after attempting to cancel noise, adjust settings, it's likely the mic is substandard.The good....amazing for songs and movies. Bass is amazing. Cancels noise well.
